joke: Why do programmers prefer dark mode? Because light attracts bugs.
Why do programmers always mix up Halloween and Christmas? Because Oct 31 == Dec 25!
There are 10 types of people in this world. Those who understand binary, and those who don't.
Pourquoi les programmeurs aiment-ils le noir ? Parce que le noir, c'est comme le code, on ne voit rien !
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!
¿Qué le dice un semáforo a otro semáforo? No me mires que te pongo verde.

टीचर: होमवर्क क्यों नहीं किया? छात्र: मैम, लाइट नहीं थी। टीचर: तो मोमबत्ती जला लेते। छात्र: मैम, माचिस नहीं थी। टीचर: तो माचिस खरीद लेते। छात्र: मैम, पैसे नहीं थे। टीचर: तो पैसे कमा लेते। छात्र: मैम, यही तो होमवर्क में था!
I'm reading a book on anti-gravity. It's impossible to put down!
¿Qué hace una abeja en el gimnasio? ¡Zumba!
I told my wife she was drawing her eyebrows too high. She looked surprised.
Qu'est-ce qu'un chat qui tombe dans un pot de peinture le jour de Noël ? Un chat-peint de Noël !
What did the atom say to the electron? Don't be negative!
¿Qué le dijo un protón a otro protón? ¡Hoy estoy positivo!
My boss told me to have a good day. So I went home.
Why did the scarecrow win an award? Because he was outstanding in his field!
Que dit un escargot quand il croise une limace ? « Tiens, t'as oublié ta maison ! »
I asked my girlfriend to tell me something that would get my heart racing. She said, 'I forgot my wallet.'
Why did the math book look sad? Because it had too many problems.
टीचर: 15 फलों के नाम बताओ। छात्र: एक दर्जन केले और तीन सेब।
Why did the tomato turn red? Because it saw the salad dressing!
¿Qué hace un mudo en un gallinero? ¡Huevos de chocolate!
Why did the football coach go to the bank? To get his quarter back.
Why did the Roman Empire fall? Because it couldn't stand being conquered by the barbarians!
I used to be a travel agent, but I gave it up. It was just too much baggage.
What's a doctor's favorite kind of music? Anything with a good beat.
Why was the mobile phone wearing glasses? Because it lost its contacts.
Why did the music teacher need a ladder? To reach the high notes.
Why did the accountant break up with the calculator? Because he just couldn't count on her.
Why did the superhero get invited to all the parties? Because he was a Marvel!
Why did Santa get a parking ticket on Christmas Eve? He left his sleigh in a snow parking zone!
My family is so annoying. We're like a tangled ball of yarn, always getting on each other's nerves.
I'm so good at sleeping, I can do it with my eyes closed.
Why did the developer go broke? Because he used up all his cache.
What's a programmer's favorite bug? A feature.
Pourquoi les développeurs n'aiment-ils pas la nature ? Trop de feuilles sans documentation.
What's the best thing about booleans? Even if you're wrong, you're only off by a bit.
Why did the bicycle fall over? Because it was two-tired.
¿Cuál es el colmo de un jardinero? Que deje a su mujer plantada.
मेरे दोस्त ने मुझसे कहा कि वह एक दिन में 1000 पुश-अप्स कर सकता है। मैंने पूछा, 'कैसे?' उसने कहा, 'धीरे-धीरे।'
I invented a new word: plagiarism.
¿Qué le dice un guepardo a otro guepardo? 'Estás hecho una bala.'
I used to be a baker, but I kneaded dough so much I got tired.
Pourquoi les poissons vivent-ils dans l'eau salée ? Parce que l'eau poivrée les ferait éternuer !
What did the biologist wear to his first date? Designer genes.
¿Por qué el 6 tenía miedo del 7? Porque el 7, 8, 9.
My job is secure. No one else wants it.
I told my boss I needed a raise. He said, 'Why don't you stand on a chair?'
What do you call a sleeping bull? A bulldozer.
Pourquoi les canards n'ont-ils jamais faim ? Parce qu'ils ont toujours la patate !
My wife and I have a great relationship. We never go to bed angry. We just stay up and fight.
Dating is like a job interview, except you're both lying and you both know it.
Why did the student eat his homework? Because the teacher told him it was a piece of cake.

गणित के अध्यापक ने छात्र से पूछा, 'अगर तुम्हारे पास 5 सेब हैं और मैं तुम्हें 5 और देता हूँ, तो तुम्हारे पास कितने होंगे?' छात्र: '10।' अध्यापक: 'बहुत अच्छे! अब बताओ, अगर तुम्हारे पास 5 केले हैं और मैं तुम्हें 5 और देता हूँ, तो तुम्हारे पास कितने होंगे?' छात्र: 'कुछ नहीं, क्योंकि केले तो मेरे पास थे ही नहीं।'
What do you call a sad strawberry? A blueberry.
¿Qué le dijo una taza a otra taza? '¿Qué taza haciendo?'
Why was the tennis match so loud? Because both players had a racket!
What do you call a boomerang that won't come back? A stick.
Why did the historian break up with the archaeologist? They had too many old issues.
What do you call a sleeping dinosaur? Dino-snore!
I'm on a seafood diet. I see food, and I eat it. Especially when I travel!
What do you call a grumpy traveler? A grum-pillion.
Why did the patient bring a ladder to the doctor's office? Because he heard he had high blood pressure.
What do you call a fake doctor? A 'phoney' physician.
Why did the computer go to the doctor? It had a virus!
I told my computer I needed a break, and it just kept buffering.
What do you call a musically talented insect? A bee-thoven.
Why did the guitar get sent to jail? For fretting too much.
Why did the stock market break up with the economy? It just wasn't feeling stable.
I just inherited a fortune from my late uncle. He died in a bank robbery. He was the teller.
Why did the superhero cross the road? To get to the other Marvel side.
What do you call a fake famous person? A 'cele-fakey.'
What do you call Santa's little helpers? Subordinate Clauses.
Why did the ghost go to the bar on Halloween? For the boos.
My family reunion was like a jigsaw puzzle. Everyone tried to fit in, but some pieces were just missing.
My kids are like a permanent record player. They keep spinning the same old complaints.
I love group projects. Said no one ever.
I'm not saying I'm lazy, but I wear a Fitbit just to track my naps.
